name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja 5
description:
Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja 5 is an action game developed by CyberConnect2 Co.. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja 5 is available on PlayStation 2.
Chikayo Fukuda scored the game.
